thread.title: BRIEF-Focused Capital II Corp. Announces Signing Of Definitive Business Combination Agreement With Fortress Blockchain Corp

title: BRIEF-Focused Capital II Corp. Announces Signing Of Definitive Business Combination Agreement With Fortress Blockchain Corp

organizations.name: definitive business combination agreement with fortress blockchain corp reuters

text: March 22, 2018 / 7:03 PM / in 25 minutes BRIEF-Focused Capital II Corp. Announces Signing Of Definitive Business Combination Agreement With Fortress Blockchain Corp Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 22 (Reuters) - Focused Capital II Corp: * FOCUSED CAPITAL II CORP. ANNOUNCES SIGNING OF DEFINITIVE BUSINESS COMBINATION AGREEMENT WITH FORTRESS BLOCKCHAIN CORP. FOR PROPOSED QUALIFYING TRANSACTION * FOCUSED CAPITAL II CORP - ‍ENTERED INTO A DEFINITIVE BUSINESS COMBINATION AGREEMENT WITH FORTRESS BLOCKCHAIN CORP. EFFECTIVE AS OF MARCH 21, 2018​ * FOCUSED CAPITAL II -CO,FORTRESS BLOCKCHAIN WILL COMPLETE TRANSACTION THAT WILL RESULT IN REVERSE-TAKEOVER OF CO BY SHAREHOLDERS OF FORTRESS BLOCKCHAIN​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
